name: MetalMamemon
effect: [When Digivolving] You may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 level 6 Digimon card with [Machine] in its traits among them to your hand. Trash the remaining cards.
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking] If this Digimon has [Machine] in its traits, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 5 or less.
